content: slipped stitches and knit them together with right needle 1 stitch decreased m1l make 1 stitch left leaning insert lh needle from front to back under strand of yarn which runs between next st on lh needle and last st on rh needle knit this st through back loop 1 stitch increased m1r make 1 stitch left leaning insert lh needle from back to front under strand of yarn which runs between next st on lh needle and last st on rh needle knit this st through front loop 1 stitch increased w&t wrap & turn slip next st to the rh needle bring yarn to opposite side of work between needles then slip same st back onto lh needle turn work to begin working in opposite direction conceal wrap on the knit side slip the rh needle under the wrap and knit it together with the st that it wraps conceal wrap on the purl side with the rh needle pick up the wrap from underneath on the opposite side and lift it up on to the lh needle then purl it together with the st that it wraps abbreviations approx approximate ly round s round s bor beginning of round rs right side of work dpns double pointed needles sm slip marker k k knit ssk see stitch guide k2tog knit two sts together 1 st decreased st s stitch stitches lh left hand st st stockinette / stocking stitch m1l see stitch guide w&t see stitch guide m1r see stitch guide ws wrong side of work mo months yo yarn over p p purl separates quantities when referring to pm place marker more than one size repeat repeat * repeat instructions from asterisk as directed rh right hand repeat instructions inside brackets as directed 2 pattern begins row 4 ws purl slipping all markers neck edge repeat row 1-4 4 4 5 5 6 6 more times then with circular needle cast on 54 58 62 66 70 repeat row 1-2 0 1 0 1 0 1 more time s there 74 sts using the long-tail cast on or your preferred are 22 24 26 28 30 32 sts for each front 34 cast on method do not join in the round 36 38 40 42 44 sts for each sleeve and 46 50 54 58 62 66 sts for back 158 170
